title: Floor Coordinates to In Game coordinates?

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: If you could post your calculation here you could save someone with the same problem some trouble in the future.

comments.author: Zirak.7028
comments.body: After spending the entire day, I finally got it! Thanks, this topic can be closed now.

comments.author: Zirak.7028
comments.body:
Thanks for your suggestion! I was doing exactly the same thing last evening for about a few hours unfortunately I’m super terrible at math I was hoping someone could work with me in reversing it?

Thanks!

comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body: See this thread: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Plotting-events-on-a-map/2916120 (you might want to reverse the calculation then )

comments.author: Zirak.7028
comments.body:
Hi,

I was wondering if it is possible to convert floor coordinates for example:
{
sector_id,
“name”:“Dostoev Sky Peak”,
level,
“coord”:[
20564.9,
16726.1
]
}

Into in-game coordinates (excluding z coordinate, as I know retrieving this would be impossible)?
